Package me.mthw.forge.ingest.ZIP

Class ZipRootFile

java.lang.Object
me.mthw.forge.ingest.ZIP.ZipRootFile
public class ZipRootFile extends Object
Represents the root file of a ZIP archive, containing metadata and records related to the ZIP file's structure and contents. Fields are based on the names from the APPNOTE specification.
